      • traineeCreateExercise

        public boolean traineeCreateExercise(java.lang.String TrainerId,
                                     java.time.LocalDate date,
                                     int timestamp,
                                     java.lang.String description)
        A trainee create a new exercise
        参数:
        TrainerId - the trainer's id
        date - the date of the exercise
        timestamp - a int range from 0 to 12 related to 24h per day
        description - the detail information
        返回:
        true if success and false if fail

        参数:

        true if success and false if fail
